docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. js/ embed.js # Microsoft PXT code blocks rendering. jquery-3.4.1.min.js # Material theme rendering. css/ extra.css # Extra styles for Material theme. MakeCode Blocks sample basic.forever(function () { basic.showNumber(0) })
docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
